head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLOCK, HAROLD S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLOCK, HAROLD S.

block.p: POLLOCK--Harold S. We deeply mourn the loss of Hal Pollock, beloved husband of Esther for 52 years; devoted father of Nancy and Jeff Korn, and sons Sandy and Danny Pollock; loving grandfather of Matthew. We will always treasure the memories of your warmth, your wisdom and your generosity of spirit, and the deep abiding love that you gave so freely.
